- [x] We now have a logo!

candidates.title: Feature/custom header
candidates.body:
Resolve #30 

- [x] Add header method to add one custom header
- [x] Add set_headers method to add multiple headers at once
- [x] Re-implement json, file response to support custom headers
- [x] Documentation
- [x] Testing

candidates.title: Radix trie router
candidates.body:
Implement Radix Trie into Router.

- [x] Radix Trie 

- [x] Sub router

- [x] Dirty path error handling

- [x] Tests

- [x] Docs

Additional implementation:

- [x] Static files routing

- [x] Fallback wildcard * search

- [x] Forward wildcard * search

- [x] UTF-8 characters handling

- [x] Tests

- [x] Docs

This PR resolves #2, resolves #3, resolves #7, resolves #20

candidates.title: Feature/context design
candidates.body:
# Request Context

Revise context functions and improve usability of request context.

## Goal

1. Auto conversion base on user define type.
2. Instead of unwrap panic, ? is preferred.
3. Support multiple form name.
4. Implement common error.

## Tasks

- [x] Forms parsing
- [x] Param parsing
- [x] JSON parsing
- [x] Unify error
- [x] Unit test
- [x] Docs
